subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mike Keenan became the first North American coach to win the Kontinental Hockey League championship as Metallurg Magnitogorsk defeated Lev Praha, 7-4, on Wednesday in Game 7 of the finals.
snippet: Mike Keenan became the first North American coach to win the Kontinental Hockey League championship as Metallurg Magnitogorsk defeated Lev Praha, 7-4, on Wednesday in Game 7 of the finals.
